They include           - diuretics, which are taken to eliminate excess fluid from the body in conditions like hypertension, edema, and heart disease, and which decrease the amount of uric acid passed in the urine     -  salicylate-containing drugs, such as aspirin     - niacin, a vitamin also known as nicotinic acid     - cyclosporine, a medication that suppresses the bodys immune system (the system that protects the body from infect
